title: Sometimes I get random frame drop after Baron buff????
body: Does anyone know why this happens and can I minimize the effects, because the effects happen nomatter what I play on Highest settings or lowest and I have max fps on highest settings, so this shouldn't be happening, so I am assuming its a bug in the system #khazix gtfo

replies.body:
That [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) Rineyy mentioned might be able to help out, but since this is happening specifically when you get Baron Buff, there might be some corrupted game files associated with Baron that are causing those frame drops. Try running a repair in the client settings to make sure you've got a clean install of the game files!

https://i.gyazo.com/3180b1e67a0d8844c431caeb8a0c2e56.png

Boost your FPS by utilising the **[Frames for days booster.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)** This booster is legal and is approved by Riot.

http://riot-web-static.s3.amazonaws.com/images/news/Skins/Tristana_RocketGirl_Splash.jpg
